WRITING.TEXT: The Fair succeds on target cost, but does little to alleivate the fears of the public.

WRITING.TITLE: [EVENT] Fair
WRITING.TEXT: In order to help ease the minds of citizens concerned about current conflicts, Texas will be holding three fairs throughout the state. One will be in Austin, one in Huston, and one in Dallas. These fairs are expected to cost 10 Million total, after any money that they bring in.

WRITING.TITLE: What's the difference between my boomerang and my dad?
WRITING.TEXT: My boomerang came back to me
The movement goes well, and save a few letter that slipped back home, un-noticed.

WRITING.TITLE: [SECRET] Positining of Troops
WRITING.TEXT: The 56th and 72nd infantry divisions will be staged at Fort Hood, In Killeen, Texas. The 136th Armored division will be staged in Camp Mabry, Austin, Texas. The 45th Infantry Division will be staged in Fort Sill, in Lawton, Oklahoma.
These troops will be housed at unspecified military bases throughout Texas

Any concerns regarding cooperative action would likely be best suited to be addresses towards the government of The United States proper, but we will do all in our power to help protect our land, our people, and our lives.

WRITING.TITLE: [CONFLICT] Preparedness for conflict
WRITING.TEXT: The Republic of Texas, by cause of the rising tensions in and the potential for conflict, would like to put the National Guards for Texas and Oklahoma on Alert, effectively gathering them with their equipment as to be prepared for rapid response to any conflict that breaks out.

WRITING.TITLE: [NEWS] Elections in Texas
WRITING.TEXT: In a never before see result, the Election has seen votes cast in a nearly identical manner as the last election, Securing the seats of Governor and his cabinet, along with the House and State Senate.
